step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting with your fists closed and arms in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Focus on exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you move outwards.
Good work on the outward arm movement. Ensure you're fully relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Excellent! You're extending your arms to shoulder height. Keep up the good work with muscle relaxation on the exhale.
You're doing great with the outward movement. Remember to fully relax your muscles as you exhale and complete the movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the horizontal pumping exercise. Keep focusing on opening your fingers and extending your arms while exhaling and relaxing your muscles. Remember to repeat this four times.
